system.description:
A minor artifact power installed in a wholly metallic weapon to increase its Impact. It cannot be combined with any other enchantment.

Successful installation increases the weaponâ€™s Impact in all aspects by one (MS) or two (CS).

The Duration is Permanent if the power is installed when the weapon is forged; otherwise, the Duration is Indefinite.

 

Bonus Effect

CML60+Enchantment may be laid upon a mostly metallic weapon.

 

Time: 15-CSI hours

Range: Touch

Duration: Indefinite/Permanent (see above)
